text: Robert Pender (born 5 November 1891) was a Scottish footballer who played for Dumbarton, St Mirren, Johnstone, Raith Rovers, Middlesbrough and St Johnstone. ==References== Category:1891 births Category:Scottish footballers Category:Dumbarton F.C. players Category:Raith Rovers F.C. players Category:Middlesbrough F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:English Football League players Category:St Mirren F.C. players Category:St Johnstone F.C. players Category:Year of death missing Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Robert Pender (footballer)
